title: Bare Land, Perfect Location - LIP 107
details: LIP-107 Situated between Ahangama and Habaraduwa this 90 perches of bare land has plenty to offer. The property is only 150 m (within walking distance) away from one of the most beautiful beaches in Sri Lanka. Kathaluwa, Welhengoda and Kabalana beaches are well known surfing beaches with tourism to this area increasing annually. A large property with plenty of coconut trees and ready for development. The UNESCO world heritage site of Galle Fort is 35 minutes’ drive away and 25 minutes to the Southern Expressway.
